content.body: How can you unset an IDL attribute like maxLength?
anyone heard anything about the microdata thing?
annevk3: is Simon on vacation already maybe?

hsivonen: I was thinking today that if the xml-stylesheet Checker subclass implements LexicalHandler then maybe I should rename it to something more general so that it can also be used later for any other lexical-checking stuff that might come up
oh, his office is closed today
annevk3: if you care to try some xml-stylesheet checking, http://qa-dev.w3.org:8888/ has support for it now
still needs to be reviewed by hsivonen so not committed yet
but enough for testing at this point at least
jgraham: 9314e70287 seems to have broken SimpleTree cloning with namespaces
jgraham: And we have loads of test failures because of it
jgraham: Also, we really ought to fix all the parse error failures, as I found quickly one case of the wrong tree being created causing one of them ot fail
